The home maintains comfort levels throughout the years' seasons with the inclusion of reverse cycle heating and cooling units in most rooms. Presented to attract the buyer who seeks the relaxed, convenient lifestyle with all the trimmings.

Every aspect of this superb home has been designed and maintained to the highest standard, with a one-of-a-kind character that blends modern sophistication with the best of 60s style.
